website_summaries.verdict: The IRIScan Executive 4 is a highly accurate manual-feed portable document scanner, but its lack of battery and wireless connectivity limit its road-worthiness.

customer_reviews.title: Fast and efficient
customer_reviews.text: My project is to get all my paper documents scanned so that I don't have tons of papers lying everywhere. Following the online start up guide made it easy to get going, works well, fast and efficient. It's also great for double sided scanning, and continuous for multiple pages. I have scanned letter size, extra long papers, as well as business cards. Everything has turned out good so far. You can only scan up to a width of 8.5" which is fine. The size of the scanner makes it nice and portable and easy to move around the desk while sorting papers.
customer_reviews.author: Rookegirl

customer_reviews.title: Good product - horrible software
customer_reviews.text: This is a great product! Scans well! Unfortunately, the software is horrendous and the product is dependent on the software. Over the last month or so since I've had the product, I've been in constant communication with tech support. They've been suggesting different versions of their software, sending me different license files (because the activation codes they send me don't work) and suggesting different things which are not available in the software (as if they don't know their own software). The software has been buggy, unresponsive, and just downright awful to use. Don't buy this product unless you feel like dealing with all that.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Did not work correctly out of the box
customer_reviews.text: Upon receipt, we connected the scanner to three separate computers, loaded the software and the scanner appeared to scan correctly, but all the images would either come out all black or all white. Recommendations in the troubleshooting guide was to calibrate the scanner using the included calibration sheet. The scanner was unable to calibrate - it would produce an error code 3021 (which we could not find on the Iriscan website troubleshooting section) and every time we attempted calibration more than 3 times, the scanner would eventually stop responding and then disconnect from the computer. Ultimately we chose to return the scanner as we could not get it to function correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Kris

customer_reviews.title: It works as decribed.
customer_reviews.text: Scanned first image, a business card. Worked extremely well. Scanner recognized image and filled in the info from the card to an address book type page along with business card image. Impressive! Scanned an 8.5 x 11 documant with great success. Scanning photos is still a learning process for me but I will figure it out.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J.

customer_reviews.title: Stay away from the product and the company; no tech support number available.
customer_reviews.text: Installed according to the guide and Windows 10 could see it in the hardware management. The software however couldn't see the device after several attempts and reboots. The claim to have technical but no phone in sight anywhere on the website. They claim to respond to your technical problem very shortly after you send them an email however after 2 days and several emails I sent no technical support. I would strongly recommend to stay away from any company that doesn't provide a phone number for technical support on the website.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J. Schperberg

customer_reviews.title: Waste of time
customer_reviews.text: All photo scans had an embedded water mark; tech support was useless, wanting to know what software I was using; I was using the software downloaded from the Iris site. Retuned unit next day after receipt.
customer_reviews.author: TB

customer_reviews.title: not worth it get a name brand
customer_reviews.text: ive used it for about a week it took ages to get it working. today the program just quit working give many error messages that make no sense. ive tried everything I could with no progress...
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas

customer_reviews.title: A waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: This product was very frustrating to set up, especially with little support from the company. After more than an hour, I got it to work...sort of. If I scan only a few documents, all is well. Any more than five or six documents fed in succession causes the scanner to freeze. I’m very dissatisfied. Do yourself a favor and spend a little more to get something that works. I gave this product five stars for portability because it was easy to carry to the trash can.
customer_reviews.author: tim dater

customer_reviews.title: Scanner Works great, perfect image. Software is clunky
customer_reviews.text: Does the job, very compact and fits nicely on my desk. Fantastic for easily getting papers scanned and off my desk space! Software is clunky, but functional once you get used to it.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Windows only.  doesn't work with apple
customer_reviews.text: I didn't realize that this is a windows only product. Don't buy it if you are using an apple computer.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Munro

customer_reviews.title: IRIScan
customer_reviews.text: Product was received exactly as described. I followed the easy to understand directions that accompanied it to download and install the drivers it needed. I had it up and scanning in under 10 minutes. The scans are great and I like that it is small, portable and can makes duplex scans saving a lot of time for me. I would highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: MD Burch

customer_reviews.title: It was OK
customer_reviews.text: Sure it duplexes fine you just have to feed every sheet in and it gets tiresome.. but for what is is, sure... They included a lot of software for FREE that I didn't even know how to use, LOL
customer_reviews.author: Tbishop

customer_reviews.title: Great scanner.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent scanner. Easy to use, quick and solid. Included SW is also excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Doug

customer_reviews.title: would not work
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to connect and operate this device and have returned it for credit per return authorization DqxTg3qtRRMA, therefore,I cannot rate the device fairly.
customer_reviews.author: B Gordon Packard

customer_reviews.title: Spend More For Better Scanner
customer_reviews.text: Item is junk. Single feed only and slow. Makes mistakes and grabs multiple sheets at a time. In the process of trying to return it.
customer_reviews.author: mpowerme

customer_reviews.title: Great way to preserve memories
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to preserve images of really old postcards we inherited. It works so good and is so easy to use! Absolutely love it.
customer_reviews.author: WyoGirl

customer_reviews.title: Great duplex scanner and it didn't cost an arm and a leg
customer_reviews.text: The software took awhile to figure out. I was happy with pdf images and it kept trying to OCR them, making mistakes in the process (not bad but I didn't need OCR) so my first attempt at scanning required starting over 3 times and it was a 375 page book. I know now. Under 100 and I can haul it anywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Requires computer connection
customer_reviews.text: Has to be connected to computer to use and difficult to get a straight scan. Not what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: William B

customer_reviews.title: This is not a good product.
customer_reviews.text: Out of the box it worked very well for a couple of months. Now, when I plug the scanner it, the software will not link up with the scanner (it cannot find it). I've replaced software and drivers (I'm pretty good with technology), and haven't yet found a solution.
customer_reviews.author: Lyle Snyder

customer_reviews.title: Do Not Buy
customer_reviews.text: DO NOT BUY THIS MODEL. The software is no longer supported or available. Returned. IRISCan Executive 4
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: Absolute junk
customer_reviews.text: I'd love to have back the hours of my life I have spent trying to make this scanner and the associated software work. I give up. It really should not be this complicated... Returning today!
customer_reviews.author: Jen B

customer_reviews.title: Easy to setup and use
customer_reviews.text: Convenient little scanner for "quick" scans (smaller) documents. Scans both sides and saves in various formats.
customer_reviews.author: R. Vlahos

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Had to reload drivers couple times but is working great now.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Horrible instructions
customer_reviews.text: The program wouldn't download and after an hour I gave up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No effort to support Linux
customer_reviews.text: This product will not work with a personal computer running Linux. The negative review is because the company fails to use open standards to provide linux compatibility.
customer_reviews.author: coltswalker

product_meta.title: IRISCan Executive 4 Duplex Portable Mobile Document Image Portable Color Scanner USB powered
product_meta.description: Mobile duplex scanner, the iris can executive 4 is a powerful combination of a fully portable duplex color scanner and easy-to-use OCR software. Compact, lightweight and USB-powered, one click PDF at Fingertip, it is the fastest duplex portable scanner on the market, designed to be carried anywhere. It's the perfect portable scanning tool for freelance, small and large companies or even lawyers and medical firms. Iris can executive 4 allows users to define easy document process thanks to the intuitive unique button manager. But that's not all. The provided world-renowned IRIS OCR software suite will easily extract all key information from your scans. Your documents are turned into fully editable files ready to be shared in the cloud, and your business cards are saved as digital contacts within your favorite contact management system.
feature_bullets: Portable Scanner, compact and lightweight, powered by the provided USB cable, no wall outlet required, fastest duplex sheet fed mobile Scanner on the market, up to 8 pages per minute
High-Precision scanning resolutions, both sides scanning in color or black and white, scan receipts, business cards, photos, and letters. Automatic document size detection and cropping
Create one multiple page PDF file by scanning multiple individual sheet in a row, automated sending, thanks to its unique button Manager software
Read iris OCR software, convert any paper document, PDF, or image file into editable Office documents and upload to the cloud in a click
Card iris: business cards recognition software, scanned business cards are automatically retyped and exported into your favorite contact Manager, windows only

Note: Activation codes is not required anymore to activate, all you need to do is to download & install latest version, then plug the scanner to the computer during the activation process. Product will activate automatically. (The product is not compatible with MAC)

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
